TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonPositionStatics

summary.span: 提供使你可以指定功能区自定义中的控件、组或选项卡的位置的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that enable you to specify the position of a control, group, or tab in a Ribbon customization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition AfterOfficeId(string officeId) cil managed

param.name: officeId
param.span: 内置控件、组或选项卡的 ID， 对象将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

span.span: The ID of the built-in control, group, or tab that the object uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.

summary.span: 返回 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡后面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab after the specified built-in control, group, or tab.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡后面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

span.span: A object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab after the specified built-in control, group, or tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法或方法来创建对象。Use this method or the method to create object. 该 ID 是唯一标识控件、 组或内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序的选项卡的名称。The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application. Id 的列表，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition BeforeOfficeId(string officeId) cil managed

param.name: officeId
param.span: 内置控件、组或选项卡的 ID， 将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

span.span: The ID of the built-in control, group, or tab that the uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.

summary.span: 返回一个新的 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡前面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

span.span: Returns a new object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab before a built-in control, group, or tab.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡前面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

span.span: A object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab before the specified built-in control, group, or tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法或方法来创建对象。Use this method or the method to create an object. 该 ID 是唯一标识控件、 组或内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序的选项卡的名称。The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application. Id 的列表，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
